Object.Name: glucose.health
Object.Description1: This Resource describes the Properties associated with context health. The health Property is a read-only value that is provided by the Server where minor and major are related to the general health or the level of illness of the person; menses refers to the female menstrual cycle; stress refers to physiological or psychological stress.

Item.Name: health
Item.Description: The various levels of health a person feels when taking a glucose.
